field.name: description
field.value:
I would like to be able to change the target in ClassProxyWithTarget. I'm not sure if/how you would want this implemented. Can we turn it on in ClassProxyWithTarget, or should we create an additional proxy type for this...
In the attached patch I implemented it in ClassProxyWithTarget. I am not familiar with the code base, so I am not sure if I did it completly correctly. It works for me.
If you are interested in implementing this, I can add some test cases and modify the implementation however you need.

comment.author: xtoff
comment.text: I can't accept this patch without comprehensive set of tests. This is a massive change.

comment.author: Dan.Jasek
comment.text: I added tests to the attached patch. I just copied and tweaked the tests I found for ChangeProxyTarget in the InterfaceProxyWithTargetInterface tests. Let me know if you need more than this.

comment.author: gman
comment.text:
I second this request.
ClassProxyWithTarget with changeable target would be useful to implement the CoW collection that can also recognize changes to its members.

comment.author: gman
xtoff
comment.text: Well, to be honest, following the existing API we'd need to create {{CreateClassProxyWithClassTarget}}. I'm happy to accept a pull request (with healthy does of tests) that does that.
